word_mean: 研究天体和其他宇宙物质的性质、结构和演化的天文学分支。

sentence.Network_en: Nowadays astrophysics and astronomy have come to mean almost the same thing.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天,天体物理学和天文学的含义已经变得差不多一样了.

sentence.Network_en: The introduction emphasized the thoroughly evolutionary nature of modern astrophysics.
sentence.Network_cn: 在绪论中业已强调,现代天体物理学是彻底的承认演化的科学.

sentence.Network_en: We are entering here into one of the most complex domains in astrophysics.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里我们涉及到了天体物理学中最复杂的领域之一.

entry.def: Astrophysics is the study of the physical and chemical structure of the stars, planets, and other natural objects in space.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of astronomy concerned with the physical and chemical properties of celestial bodies
